Author: Goladus
Content: I thought the same, however it still may be useful as a survey book. It's something I might read as a starting point. Sometimes it's discouraging to slog through a technical paper only to discover that it's not going to help you much.

Author: Goladus
Content:
One mistake I actually rarely see bloggers make is to use an acronym without defining it. Maybe I'm just lucky.

In any case, I don't see the phrase "Search Engine Optimization" even once in that post.
